title: 4 people, including a child, killed in a mass shooting in Orange, California, police say
description: Police found "multiple victims" at an office complex in Orange, California, after responding to a call of shots fired Wednesday night.

title: Taiwan's TSMC is pouring $100 billion into chipmaking over the next three years
description: Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company, the world's largest contract chipmaker, announced Thursday that it expects to pour $100 billion into advanced chips over the next three years to keep up with rising demand.

title: Thousands of cases of a worrying variant have been reported in the US. These states have the highest numbers
description: Thousands of cases of the B.1.1.7 variant have been reported across the US, and experts fear the strain may fuel another Covid-19 surge as states race to vaccinate more residents.

title: The first Korean American first lady in the US: We will not stand silent any more
description: • Man arrested in hate crime assault on Asian woman was out on parole for killing his mom

title: Hong Kong court convicts Jimmy Lai and other pro-democracy activists over 2019 protest
description: A Hong Kong court has convicted pro-democracy media tycoon Jimmy Lai and eight other prominent opposition activists over their roles in an unauthorized assembly at the height of the 2019 protests.

title: Asia's first 'travel bubble' opens between Taiwan and Palau
description: More than a year after Covid-19 was first detected, Asia's first "travel bubble" has finally launched.

title: Corporate giants bow to pressure in Georgia voting law backlash
Australia marks quietest fire season in a decade
description: Australia's most populous state has closed out its quietest fire season in a decade, its fire service said, as the coolest and wettest summer in years offered a reprieve from the uncontrolled blazes that torched large swathes of the country in 2019 and 2020.

title: Dr. Fauci on Dr. Birx: You need to cut her some slack
description: Dr. Anthony Fauci discusses criticism he and Dr. Deborah Birx have faced for not speaking out against President Trump more during his administration.

title: Powdered bones are keeping Solar Orbiter cool thanks to an Irish startup
description: When the European Space Agency (ESA) designed a spacecraft to fly closer to the sun than any other probe in history, it faced a major problem: how to shield the probe from extreme heat and radiation.

title: Myanmar junta offers ceasefire to some, as UN envoy warns of 'bloodbath'
She's 14 months old and needs a drug that costs $2.1 million to save her life
description: For the first few months of her life, Ayah Lundt was the picture of health.

title: Man arrested in hate crime assault on Asian woman was out on parole for killing his mom
description: The man arrested in the "hate crime assault" on a 65-year-old Asian woman in New York City was out on parole for killing his mother, police told CNN.

title: Macron announces tougher Covid restrictions as he warns France risks 'losing control'
Manufacturing moonshot: How Pfizer makes its millions of Covid-19 vaccine doses
description: When the coronavirus pandemic began, the challenge for Pfizer and BioNTech wasn't just developing a Covid-19 vaccine -- they also had to make it, and by the hundreds of millions.

title: What is Bolsonaro trying to do with Brazil's military?
description: Brazil reported yet another record number of deaths on Tuesday as a surge of Covid-19 infections cripples hospitals across the country. But it's the political turmoil rocking the government that grabbed headlines on Wednesday.

title: 'Godzilla vs. Kong' could be the biggest hit of the pandemic
description: Since the beginning of the coronavirus outbreak, Hollywood has kept a close eye on any movie that could give some insights into the film industry's potential renaissance or demise after the pandemic has abated.

title: Senate Republicans already have a Donald Trump problem
description: Over the past 10 days, two things happened that make clear that a) Trumpism isn't going anywhere and b) it's going to complicate Republican attempts to retake control of the Senate next November.

title: Chauvin's body camera footage shows his reaction just after George Floyd left in an ambulance
description: An off-duty Minneapolis firefighter who was rebuffed from rendering aid to George Floyd last May is set to return to the stand in Derek Chauvin's trial on Wednesday after a judge criticized her behavior while testifying.

title: It's no joke -- thunder wakes the peepers and brings good crops of corn and hay
description: Spring is in full swing, and like the weather, so are the thunderous weather-themed proverbs.

title: Microsoft earns contract worth up to $21.9 billion to make AR devices for the US Army
description: Microsoft has scored another major government contract, this time to produce augmented reality devices for the US Army.

title: Alexey Navalny announces he is going on hunger strike
description: Russian opposition figure Alexey Navalny says he is going on a hunger strike to protest against prison officials' refusal to grant him access to proper medical care, in a post shared by his team on his official Instagram page on Wednesday.

title: A teacher resigned after her racist rant stereotyping Black families during a Zoom call was recorded by a parent
description: After a Zoom call with a student and his mother, a California teacher who thought the call had ended was recorded saying her student has learned to lie and make excuses, calling the parents "pieces of sh*t" and saying "this is what Black people do," according to the mother's attorneys.

title: Top US national security officials call counterparts as Russia and Ukraine tensions rise
description: Top US national security officials have spoken with their Ukrainian counterparts, and America's top general held a call Wednesday with his Russian opposite number amid concern over Russian military activity in Crimea and eastern Ukraine, including what the US deemed a violation of a ceasefire by Moscow that led to the deaths of four Ukrainian soldiers last week.

title: Covid-19 led to a global increase in stillbirths, maternal mortality, and depression, review finds
description: The Covid-19 pandemic had a significant and negative impact on pregnant women and their infants, according to a global review of studies.

title: Former police chief: Officers made situation worse when they got there
description: CNN's Erin Burnett and former Detroit Police Chief Isaiah McKinnon discuss the Minneapolis Police officers' initial interaction with George Floyd when they first arrived on scene.
